channel.title: Stuck at "Checking for updates - 1%"
channel.description:
Hello,
Problem: http://gyazo.com/f395fe957894b2eee5146ec5f32e6844 (Client get's stuck at 1%) Source: Disturbed V2.2 Client: Disturbed Client Other Information: I've changed the ip in Loader.java to my no-ip (insanepkzserver.no-ip.biz), my port is open: http://gyazo.com/c58a8d5349efee72316def52c4f8447f It works fine on localhost, and i don't know what to do next, any help is much appreciated, thanks. :)
PS. I haven't tried hosting a server in years, sorry if this is nooby :p
